com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.receivers

Class AdminActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
        • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.receivers.AdminActions

  • public class AdminActions
extends android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
    Created by aravind on 9/9/14. Class extending the DeviceAdminReceiver class so that the app will have admin privileges to change password and lock screen automatically
